Author: allbits#5898
Content: will only be liable if the injured party can prove all of the elements of negligence liability: duty, reliance, breach of duty (negligence), injury, and causation. If any one of these five elements cannot be established, then liability will not result. The case law in this area leads to the conclusion that absent some significant involvement or control, assumption of responsibility, or clear negligence, is not likely to be held liable for its good faith endorsement of vendor products or services

Author: BlackJesus#6161

Content: That's for a civil claim. "Serving time" would require actual knowledge and/or a common purpose
